front.title: Registration of Military Message Handling System (MMHS) header fields for use in Internet Mail

abstract.t: A Miltary Message Handling System (MMHS) processes formal messages ensuring release, distribution, security, and timely delivery across national and international strategic and tactical networks. The MMHS Elements of Service are defined as a set of extensions to the ITU-T X.400 (1992) international standards and are specified in STANAG 4406 Edition 2. This document describes a method for enabling those MMHS Elements of Service that are defined as Heading Extension to be encoded as RFC 5322 (Internet Email) message header fields. These header field definitions support the provision of a STANAG 4406 MMHS over Internet Email, and also provides for a STANAG 4406 / Internet Email Gateway supporting message conversion compliant to this specification.
